CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Errors.​Error
IComparable
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Errors.​Error

A class containing information about an error that occurred in the engine.

A constructor for an error that occurs in a specific file.

A constructor for an error that occurs in a specific file.

Whether the error occurs in the passed location.

Matches

Whether the error occurs in the passed location.

CompareTo
public int CompareTo (
object otherObject
)

Implements IComparable.CompareTo() so that errors can be sorted.  They are sorted by File, then LineNumber, then ConfigSource, then Property.

Properties
Message
public string Message { get }

The error message itself.

File
public Path File { get }

The Path the error occurs in, if appropriate.  Will be null otherwise.

LineNumber
public int LineNumber { get; set }

The line number in the File the error occurs in, if appropriate.  Will be zero otherwise.

ConfigSource
public Config.Source ConfigSource { get; set }

The config source the error occurs in, if appropriate.  Will be Config.Source.NotDefined otherwise.

Property
public string Property { get; set }

The propery that the error occurs in, if appropriate.  Will be null otherwise.

The string will match the class property name.  For example, an error in <ProjectConfig.TabWidth> will have "TabWidth".  An error in the global title will be "ProjectInfo.Title".  If it occurs in one of the targets, it will be something like "InputTargets[0].Folder" or "OutputTargets[1].ProjectInfo.Title".
